(I've been given control of Earth's characters, so here goes)

::Bobertron/Magmatron::

    He went to find Magmatron to tell him of Pantrons mission. He found him 
in his office. He was hunched over a computer monitor typing something. He 
walked around to see what it was. It was a diagram of a spider bug (Phobia's 
work). He was reprogramming one of the little bugs.
    "I'm glad you came Bobertron. I have something important to tell you." 
Magmatron said as he noticed Bobertron. "I am leaving you in command of the 
base well I'm gone. I do not know when I will be back, and if I go offline a 
message will appear on the screen here.
    "Let Mantella go on some hunting missions, it will give here pratice of 
her new abilaties. Also let Shredder do the same.
    "If you recive a message from the Iron Fist or the Maximals respond to 
it. I am trying to make an alliance with the Maximals and I wish to destroy 
the Iron Fist.
    "Be warned, there is an infestation of bugs on the ship, the cleaning 
systems are not working, so please kill all that you find. CyberShark is 
developing a relationship with the Predacon Battera, do nothing to interfere.
    "My plans are here on the computer, they will only respond to my 
signature though. In the event of my untimly death they will be able to you. 
Good-Bye and Good-Luck."
    With that Magmatron took his leave. Bobertron was quite stunned. He had 
just been given control of the Destron base, he didn't really know what to 
think. But he knew he had to familiraize himself with the computer systems 
before anything. He sat down in Magmatron's chair, which was somewhat to big 
for him and connected with the main computer (kinda like Dinobot in "Code of 
Hero"). Information started to pour into his head. He now suspected he would 
be more knowledgable of this ship than even Magmatron.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Cheetor/Primal Prime::

    They were both heading back to the Maximal base. Cheetor looked around at 
his surroundings, they all looked so familiar.
    "So, Primal, umm...how did you get into the Beast Wars?" Cheetor asked.
    "I don't really know, I think I was from a stasis pod from the Axalon, 
but I could be wrong." Primal replied.
    "The Axalon!, Hey that was my ship. It's how I got this spot on smooth 
fur coat." Cheetor said.
